channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: BREAKING NEWS: A report of shots fired on NE Second Street n
item.description: BREAKING NEWS: A report of shots fired on NE Second Street near Franklin Avenue has brought numerous police to the area; no word of any injuries and police say a person of interest has been detained, ask the public to avoid the area as the investigation continues.

item.title: UPDATE: Oregon State Police say an 18-year-old Klamath Walls
item.description: UPDATE: Oregon State Police say an 18-year-old Klamath Walls woman was killed and four people injured when she drove her eastbound Tesla Model S into the oncoming lane and collided head-on with a Jeep Wagoneer. Four people in the Jeep suffered minor to moderate injuries. Troopers say speed was 'a primary contributing factor' in the crash.

item.title: Check your fridge: CDC warns against eating recalled deli me
item.description: Check your fridge: CDC warns against eating recalled deli meat as deadly listeria outbreak expands, including eight deaths and over 50 illnesses.
